snippet.title: Rayman Legends - E3 2013 - "Epic" Trailer [US]
snippet.description:
Discover the new Epic trailer of the awarded platformer game 'Rayman Legends'.

Follow Barbara, Rayman and their friends in a legendary adventure, fighting against bad guys and  huge bosses such as the Giant Boss Toad and The Ocean Red Dragon!

Official Website: http://rayman-legends.com
Join us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/rayman
